overview: Feeling her early promiscuity hurt others and herself... Melony hid from her own smoldering sexuality. Then she meets Jonathon, an exhilarating, inspiring, and intoxicating poet/landscape artist. Jonathon's lust for life is contagious! He draws Melony out of the shadows and into the light where she blossoms into a bounty of beauty and passion!
title: Wildflower
